item.title: 法国干邑白兰地生产商反击中国反倾销调查
item.description: French cognac makers have hit back at claims by China that they are dumping brandy in the Chinese market, saying the price discounts alleged are unusually small for such a formal investigation.翻译:法国干邑白兰地生产商对中国有关他们在中国市场倾销白兰地的说法进行了反击，称所称的价格折扣对于此类正式调查而言异常小。

item.title: 独家：中国要求地方政府融资平台停止发行离岸364天债券——消息人士
item.description: Chinese regulators have told heavily indebted local government financing vehicles (LGFVs) to stop issuing offshore bonds with a 364-day duration, closing a regulatory loophole that had allowed them to increase borrowing further last year, four sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.翻译:四位知情人士向路透社透露，中国监管机构已要求负债累累的地方政府融资平台（LGFV）停止发行期限为 364 天的离岸债券，以堵住去年允许它们进一步增加借贷的监管漏洞。

item.title: 杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 2024 年第一周苹果 iPhone 在中国销量下降 30%
item.description: Apple 's iPhone sales in China dropped by 30% in the first week of 2024, Jefferies analysts said in a note, adding to signs of growing competitive pressures from domestic rivals such as Huawei (HWT.UL) for the U.S. tech giant.翻译:杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 分析师在一份报告中表示，2024 年第一周，苹果 iPhone 在中国的销量下降了 30%，这加剧了华为 (HWT.UL) 等国内竞争对手对这家美国科技巨头的竞争压力日益加大的迹象。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 中国将于1月8日至9日在东海进行实弹演习
item.description: China will conduct live firing drills in some areas in the East China Sea from 10 a.m. (0200 GMT) to 3 p.m. on Monday and Tuesday, according to the China maritime safety administration.翻译:据中国海事局称，中国将于周一和周二上午 10 点（格林威治标准时间 0200）至下午 3 点在东海部分海域进行实弹演习。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达将于 2024 年第二季度推出专注于中国的 AI 芯片 - 消息人士
item.description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia plans to begin mass production in the second quarter of 2024 of an artificial intelligence (AI) chip it designed for China to comply with U.S. export rules, two people familiar with the matter said on Monday.翻译:两位知情人士周一表示，美国芯片制造商英伟达计划于 2024 年第二季度开始批量生产其为中国设计的人工智能 (AI) 芯片，以遵守美国的出口规定。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Fanny Potkin

item.title: 吉利 Zeekr 计划 2024 年将电动汽车交付量翻一番
item.description: Zeekr is aiming to deliver 230,000 cars in 2024, double its deliveries in 2023, a company spokesperson said on Monday, as the electric car brand of China's Geely (GEELY.UL) ramps up sales of new models and expand into overseas markets.翻译:公司发言人周一表示，随着中国吉利 (GEELY.UL) 电动汽车品牌加大新车型销量并拓展海外市场，Zeekr 的目标是在 2024 年交付 23 万辆汽车，是 2023 年交付量的两倍。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国监管机构取消共同基金股票净卖出禁令
item.description: China's securities regulator is allowing mutual fund managers to sell more shares than they buy each day, three sources said, removing a ban introduced late last year aimed at propping up a flagging stock market.翻译:三名消息人士称，中国证券监管机构允许共同基金经理每天出售的股票数量多于购买的股票数量，从而取消了去年年底推出的旨在支撑低迷股市的禁令。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 无视台湾的抱怨，海峡上空发现更多中国气球
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it detected three more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周日又发现三个中国气球飞越台湾海峡，其中一个飞越台湾岛，这是台湾国防部表示在过去一个月发现的一系列此类气球中的最新一个。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大电动汽车部门称副董事长被拘留，股价下跌
item.description: China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group said on Monday its Vice Chairman Liu Yongzhuo has been detained and is under criminal investigation, sending its stock tumbling and marking another setback after a share sale plan was scrapped.翻译:中国恒大新能源汽车集团周一表示，其副董事长刘永灼已被拘留并正在接受刑事调查，这导致该公司股价暴跌，这是继售股计划被取消后的又一次挫折。
item.author: Clare Jim, Donny Kwok

item.title: 中国商务部将制裁五家美国制造商对台军售
item.description: China will sanction five U.S. military manufacturers in response to the latest round of U.S. arms sales to Taiwan, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Sunday.翻译:外交部发言人周日表示，中国将制裁五家美国军工制造商，以回应美国最新一轮对台军售。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 缅甸叛军控制了中国边境附近的重要城镇
item.description: A Myanmar rebel alliance has gained control of a key town along the country's volatile northern border with China after weeks of fierce fighting with junta troops, the alliance and the junta said.翻译:缅甸反叛联盟和军政府表示，经过与军政府军队数周的激烈战斗，缅甸反叛联盟已控制了该国与中国北部边境的一个重要城镇。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国制定国有资本预算指导方针
item.description: China's State Council issued guidelines on improving an operating budget system for state-owned capital, according to a statement on the government website on Saturday.翻译:据政府网站周六发布的一份声明，中国国务院发布了关于完善国有资本经营预算制度的指导意见。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾猛烈抨击中国气球，称其为安全威胁、心理战
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry accused China on Saturday of threatening aviation safety and waging psychological warfare on the island's people with a recent spate of balloons spotted near or over the island, days before key Taiwanese elections.翻译:台湾国防部周六指责中国威胁航空安全，并对台湾民众发动心理战，在台湾重要选举前几天，最近在台湾附近或上空发现了一系列气球。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 北京称马尔代夫总统将于1月8日至12日访华
item.description: The president of the Maldives, Mohamed Muizzu, will pay a state visit to China from Jan. 8 to 12, the Chinese foreign ministry said in statement on Friday, in what would be a high-profile snub to the island nation's huge neighbour India.翻译:中国外交部周五在声明中表示，马尔代夫总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖将于 1 月 8 日至 12 日对中国进行国事访问，这将是对该岛国巨大邻国印度的高调冷落。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 王毅：中美合作“不再是一种选择……而是势在必行”
item.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Friday the most urgent task for Sino-U.S. relations is to establish a correct understanding and cooperation between the two sides, stressing it is "no longer an option ... but an imperative" for the world.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周五表示，中美关系最紧迫的任务是双方建立正确的理解与合作，并强调这对世界“不再是一种选择……而是势在必行”。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ethan Wang

item.title: 中国财富管理公司中植申请破产清算
item.description: Chinese wealth manager Zhongzhi Enterprise Group has filed for bankruptcy liquidation after failing to repay debt, as the firm grapples with a deepening property market downturn.翻译:中国财富管理公司中植企业集团因未能偿还债务而申请破产清算，该公司正努力应对房地产市场日益低迷的局面。
item.author: Reuters
